alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche; Cotton; Grady; Jefferson; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 11:40PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Scattered showers and isolated thunderstorms with gusty winds will impact portions of eastern Comanche, northwestern Jefferson, southwestern Grady, southern Caddo, Stephens and Cotton Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1139 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered showers and isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Lake Lawtonka to 4 miles east of Geronimo to 6 miles southwest of Temple. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lawton, Duncan, Chickasha, Marlow, Walters, Waurika, Elgin, Comanche, Apache, Geronimo, Rush Springs, Bray, Fletcher, Cyril, Temple, Sterling, Cement, Randlett, Medicine Park and Norge. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 10 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caddo; Comanche; Cotton; Grady; Jefferson; Stephens
